message: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
If you can dream it, you can achieve it
The only way to do great work is to love what you do
Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be
Dream big and dare to fail
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
I would rather die of passion than of boredom
If the wind will not serve, take to the oars
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be
Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see
The best revenge is massive success
Either you run the day, or the day runs you
Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is

description: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans
It is never too late to be what you might have been

message: All our dreams can come true–if we have the courage to pursue them
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right
It is never too late to be what you might have been
The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work
Drive Away with No Destination in Mind
Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
The best way to predict the future is to invent it
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way
An obstacle is often a stepping stone
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step
You must be the change you wish to see in the world
Tough times never last, but tough people do
The best way out is always through
Don’t count the days, make the days count
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly
